data.name: Fix the English syntax
data.description:
Given a string, fix the syntax.

The first letter must be capitalized
Elipses ( ... ) must be followed by a space and a capital letter
Periods ( . ) must be followed by a space and a capital letter
Question marks ( ? ) must be followed by a space and a capital letter
Exclamation marks ( ! ) must be followed by a space and a capital letter
commas ( , ) must be followed by a space
colons ( : ) must be followed by a space
semicolons ( ; ) must be followed by a space
Words should only be separated by a single space


The input string will be a valid English sentence.

Example: `"a life without a cause,is chaos. live long and prosper."`  
Output:  `"A life without a cause, is chaos. Live long and prosper."`

Example: `"Good... i suppose."`  
Output:  `"Good... I suppose."`
